long_description: Even when you're getting soaked, keep your pack and its contents dry with the lightweight, waterproof Osprey UL raincover, available here in a large size. Osprey UL Large raincover is ideally sized for packs 3,600 cu. in. (60 liters) and larger. Light, 40-denier ripstop nylon is coated with polyurethane to keep water and snow from penetrating. Drawcord lets you securely cinch cover around pack for a snug fit. Osprey UL raincover packs down small to minimize space in your pack when not in use.
short_description: Even when you're getting soaked, keep your pack and its contents dry with the lightweight, waterproof Osprey UL raincover, available here in a large size.
